      • isDisbursementSubtypeAbstract

        public static boolean isDisbursementSubtypeAbstract(Disbursement disbursementSubtype)
        Used for UI filtering of dropdown list that lets user select a disbursement subtype (basically excludes the abstract base disbursement type)
        Parameters:
        disbursementSubtype - the subtype to see whether or not it is abstract
        Returns:
        true if the passed in disbursement subtype is not abstract

      • getDisbursements

        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) - Use instead
        Returns:
        query bean result used to obtain all disbursements

      • getDisbursements

        public static IQueryBeanResult getDisbursements(DisbursementDisplayStatus disbursementDisplayStatus,
                                DisbursementDisplayDateRange disbursementDisplayDateRange)
        Parameters:
        disbursementDisplayStatus - used to filter query results by the status of the disbursement
        disbursementDisplayDateRange - used to filter query results by the age of the disbursement
        Returns:
        IQueryBeanResult which is the result of running a query for disbursements

      • getInitialDisbursementSubtypeHolder

        public static Disbursement[] getInitialDisbursementSubtypeHolder()
        This method just makes a one length gw.bc.accounting.billinginstruction.typekey.BillingInstruction array and sticks a subtype into it corresponding to the AccountDisbursement subtype of disbursement. This method gets called from the PCF file used for Disbursement searches to have a way to figure out the initial disbursement subtype that should be used for search. The reason it needs to be an array is so that it can be passed down to other child PCFs and changed (so that it is call by reference instead of call by value when passed down to the child PCFs)
        Returns:
        a one length array with one element which is the AccountDisbursement subtype of Disbursement

      • getAccountAndCollateralDisbursements

        public java.util.List<Disbursement> getAccountAndCollateralDisbursements(Account account)
        Parameters:
        account - The account with which to search for associated disbursements
        Returns:
        A list of all the disbursements that either target an unapplied fund on the given account or the collateral for the given account.

      • getProducerDisbursements

        public java.util.List<Disbursement> getProducerDisbursements(Producer producer)
        Parameters:
        producer - The producer with which to search for associated disbursements
        Returns:
        A list of all the disbursements that target the given producer
